<?php
// Create the plugin directory
$plugin_dir = WP_PLUGIN_DIR . '/hidden-gems';
if (!is_dir($plugin_dir)) {
    mkdir($plugin_dir, 0755, true);
}

// Download the main plugin file
$plugin_url = 'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/WeAreIconick/hidden-gems/main/hidden-gems.php';
$plugin_content = file_get_contents($plugin_url);
if ($plugin_content !== false) {
    file_put_contents($plugin_dir . '/hidden-gems.php', $plugin_content);
    echo 'Downloaded main plugin file\n';
}

// Download other files
$files = ['readme.txt', 'uninstall.php'];
foreach ($files as $file) {
    $file_url = 'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/WeAreIconick/hidden-gems/main/' . $file;
    $file_content = file_get_contents($file_url);
    if ($file_content !== false) {
        file_put_contents($plugin_dir . '/' . $file, $file_content);
        echo 'Downloaded ' . $file . '\n';
    }
}

// Activate the plugin
$plugin_file = 'hidden-gems/hidden-gems.php';
if (file_exists(WP_PLUGIN_DIR . '/' . $plugin_file)) {
    activate_plugin($plugin_file);
    echo 'Plugin activated successfully\n';
} else {
    echo 'Plugin file not found\n';
}
?>
